data.name: BuddyBotName
data.comment: "Honorbuddy"

data.name: ButtonText_Cancel
data.comment: "Cancel"

data.name: ButtonText_Load
data.comment: "Load" (as in, "Load a profile")

data.name: ButtonText_No
data.comment: "No"

data.name: ButtonText_OK
data.comment: "OK"

data.name: ButtonText_Reset
data.comment: "Reset"

data.name: ButtonText_ResetToDefaults
data.comment: "Reset to Defaults"

data.name: ButtonText_Yes
data.comment: "Yes"

data.name: Button_BuddyPopUpDown_ToolTipFormat
data.value: Left-click mouse to minimize or restore {0}.
data.comment: "Left-click mouse to minimize or restore {0}." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Button_Pause_Label
data.comment: "Pause"

data.name: Button_Pause_ToolTipFormat
data.value: Left-click mouse to pause or resume {0}.
data.comment: "Left-click mouse to pause or resume {0}." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g., Gatherbuddy)* ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Button_Start_Label
data.comment: "Start"

data.name: Button_Start_ToolTipFormat
data.comment: "Left-click mouse to start {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g., Gatherbuddy)* ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Button_Stop_Label
data.comment: "Stop"

data.name: Button_Stop_ToolTipFormat
data.comment: "Left-click mouse to stop {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g., Gatherbuddy)* ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Dialog_FormatText_IsNotAValidKeybind
data.value: '{1}' is not a viable keybind.{0}{0}Please select another key,{0} or add an Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier{0} to the current selection.
data.comment: "'{1}' is not a viable keybind.{0}{0}Please select another key,{0} or add an Alt, Ctrl, or Shift modifier{0} to the current selection." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied s the 'newline' character * {1} will be supplied as the name of the offending key * Please use the newline character to break the translation at logical places where its not all one long text line.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_BotActionsDefined_SpecificBot
data.value: Selects specific activities for the {0} bot to conduct.
data.comment: "Selects specific activities for the {0} bot to conduct." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g., Gatherbuddy)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_BotActionsNotAvailable_SpecificBot
data.value: There are no available actions for the {0} bot.
data.comment: "There are no available actions for the {0} bot." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g., Gatherbuddy)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_Event_Paused
data.comment: "{0} paused {1}" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * {1} wll be provided as the bot name (e.g., QuestBot)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_Event_Resumed
data.comment: "{0} resumed {1}" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * {1} wll be provided as the bot name (e.g., QuestBot)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_Event_Running
data.comment: "{0} running {1}" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * {1} wll be provided as the bot name (e.g., QuestBot)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_Event_Stopped
data.comment: "{0} running {1}" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_Event_Stopping
data.comment: "{0} stopping {1}..." NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * {1} wll be provided as the bot name (e.g., QuestBot) * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_MinimizingBuddyBot
data.comment: "Minimizing {0}" (we are sending the BuddyBot to iconic form) NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_OverlayIsNotActive
data.value: Overlay is not active, or Desktop Composition is disabled in your operating system.{0} The {1} will not be available because of this.
data.comment: "Overlay is not active, or Desktop Composition is disabled in your operating system.{0} The {1} will not be available because of this." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the 'newline' character * {1} will be supplied as the plugin name (e.g., BuddyControlPanel) * Please use the newline character to break the translation at logical places where its not all one long text line.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ProfileLoadingPleaseWait
data.comment: "Profile loading{0}(please wait)" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the 'newline' character * Please use the newline character to break the translation at logical places where its not all one long text line. The screen real-estate we have to work with this is very small.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_RestoringBuddyBot
data.comment: "Restoring {0}" (we are restoring the BuddyBot from iconic form) NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ThisPluginCanOnlyBeEnabledOrDisabledFromTheMainHonorbuddyUI
data.value: This plugin can only be enabled or disabled from the main {0} UI.
data.comment: "This plugin can only be enabled or disabled from the main {0} UI." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * "UI"means 'user interface'. If this acronym is not common in your locale, you will need to translate accordingly.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_VendorActionsCancelled
data.comment: "Vendor actions cancelled: {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the vendor action that is affected (e.g., Mail, Sell, etc.)

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_VendorActionsScheduled
data.comment: "Vendor actions cancelled: {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the vendor action that is affected (e.g., Mail, Sell, etc.)

data.name: GeneralText_BotActions
data.comment: "Bot Actions" (examples of bot actions are "repair", "sell", and "mail").

data.name: GeneralText_BotActionsDefined_UnknownBot
data.value: Selects specific activities for this bot to conduct.
data.comment: "Selects specific activities for this bot to conduct."

data.name: GeneralText_BotActionsNotAvailable_UnknownBot
data.value: There are no available actions for this bot.
data.comment: "There are no available actions for this bot."

data.name: GeneralText_DisabledWhileBotIsRunning
data.comment: "Disabled while bot is running."

data.name: GeneralText_DisabledWhileProfileIsLoading
data.comment: "Disabled while profile is loading."

data.name: GeneralText_FailedToStartBot
data.comment: "{0} failed to start {1}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * {1} will be supplied as the Bot name (e.g., QuestBot)

data.name: GeneralText_FinalLogPhrase
data.comment: "(Please see log for details)" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the parentheses, if possible.

data.name: GeneralText_LoadingProfile
data.comment: "Loading profile..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: GeneralText_HowItWorks_MailSell
data.value: It does make sense for both Mail and Sell to be checked, simultaneously. Mailing is given preference over selling for items that are eligible for both. Items that cannot be mailed—perhaps because they are soulbound—will be sold instead.
data.comment: "It does make sense for both Mail and Sell to be checked, simultaneously. Mailing is given preference over selling for items that are eligible for both. Items that cannot be mailed—perhaps because they are soulbound—will be sold instead."

data.name: GeneralText_MouseLeftButtonToEnableOrDisable
data.comment: "Left-mouse button to enable/disable."

data.name: GeneralText_MouseRightButtonForPluginSettings
data.comment: "Right-mouse button for plugin settings."

data.name: GeneralText_MouseRightForContextMenu
data.comment: "Right-click mouse for context menu."

data.name: GeneralText_None
data.comment: "none"

data.name: GeneralText_NoProfileCurrentlySelected
data.comment: "No profile currently selected."

data.name: GeneralText_OnlyProfilesForTheFollowingBotsMayBeConfigured
data.value: Only profiles for the following bots may be configured:
data.comment: "Only profiles for the following bots may be configured:"

data.name: GeneralText_PauseHotkeyIgnoredBotIsNotRunning
data.value: Pause hotkey ignored: {0} is not running
data.comment: "Pause hotkey ignored: {0} is not running" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the Bot name (e.g., QuestBot)

data.name: GeneralText_PluginHasNoSettings
data.comment: "Plugin has no settings"

data.name: GeneralText_PluginIsNowDisabled
data.comment: "Plugin is now disabled"

data.name: GeneralText_PluginIsNowEnabled
data.comment: "Plugin is now enabled"

data.name: GeneralText_ProblemEncounteredTryingToObtain
data.comment: "Problem encountered trying to obtain " (as in "Problem encountered trying to obtain ITEMNAME")

data.name: GeneralText_ProfileCouldNotBeFound
data.comment: ""Profile could not be found:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: GeneralText_ProfileFailedToLoad
data.comment: ""Failed to load profile:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: GeneralText_ProfileLoadCompleted
data.comment: "Profile load completed"

data.name: GeneralText_ThereIsNoProfileLoadedToConfigure
data.value: There is no profile loaded to configure.
data.comment: "There is no profile loaded to configure."

data.name: GeneralText_ThereWasAnErrorRequestingTheWebProfile
data.value: There was an error requesting the web profile:
data.comment: "There was an error requesting the web profile:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: GeneralText_ThisActionIsOnlyAvailableForTheFollowingBots
data.value: This action is only available to the following bots:
data.comment: "This action is only available to the following bots:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: GeneralText_Unknown
data.comment: "Unknown" (as in 'Unknown" CombatRoutine)

data.name: Item_BotConfigurationSpecificUnavailable_ToolTipFormat
data.value: Bot '{0}' does not have any configuration.
data.comment: "Bot '{0}' does not have any configuration." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g.,, QuestBot) * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_BotConfigurationSpecific_LabelFormat
data.comment: "Bot ({0}) configuration..." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g.,, QuestBot) * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.comment: "Configuration settings for the '{0}' bot." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the bot name (e.g.,, QuestBot) * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.value: Bot does not have any configuration.
data.comment: "Bot does not have any configuration." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.comment: "Bot Configuration..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.comment: "Configuration settings for the currently selected Bot." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.comment: "Closes the context menu with no action." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_Exit_Label
data.comment: "Exit"

data.name: Item_Goal_Label
data.comment: "Goal:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_Help_BuddyAuthenticationPortal_Label
data.comment: "Buddy Authentication Portal" NOTES: * The Buddy Authentication Portal is available in English only. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "Buddy Authentication Portal (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_BuddyAuthenticationPortal_Uri
data.comment: https://buddyauth.com/ NOTES: * The Buddy Authentication Portal is not locale-specific, so there is no point in altering this URI.

data.name: Item_Help_BuddyStore_Label
data.comment: "Buddy Store" NOTES: * The Buddy Store is available in English only. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "Buddy Store (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_BuddyStore_Uri
data.comment: https://store.buddyauth.com/ NOTES: * The Buddy Store is not locale-specific, so there is no point in altering this URI.

data.name: Item_Help_GuidesForum_Label
data.comment: "Guides forum" NOTES: * If there is no 'guides forum' for your locale, you may want to translate this phrase as "Guides forum (English)". * If your locale does have a 'guides forum', you will want to do a straight translation, and alter the Item_Help_GuidesForum_Uri accordingly.

data.name: Item_Help_GuidesForum_Uri
data.comment: https://www.thebuddyforum.com/honorbuddy-forum/honorbuddy-guides/ NOTES: * If your locale has a language-specific 'guides forum', please alter this URIto point to it.

data.name: Item_Help_HelpDesk_Label
data.comment: "HelpDesk" NOTES: * The HelpDesk is available in English only. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "HelpDesk (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_HelpDesk_Uri
data.comment: http://wiki.thebuddyforum.com/index.php?title=Category:Honorbuddy:HelpDesk

data.name: Item_Help_ReleaseForum_Label
data.comment: "Release forum" NOTES: * The Release forum is available only in English. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "Release forum (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_ReleaseForum_Uri
data.comment: https://www.thebuddyforum.com/releases/

data.name: Item_Help_ReleaseNotes_Label
data.comment: "Release Notes" NOTES: * Release notes are delivered only in English. So, you may want to translate this phrase as "Release Notes (English)".

data.name: Item_Help_ReleaseNotes_Uri
data.comment: http://updates.buddyauth.com/GetNewestChangelog?filter=Honorbuddy

data.name: Item_Help_StartHere_Label
data.comment: "START HERE" NOTES: * The 'START HERE' page is available in English only. So, you may want to translate the phrase as "START HERE (English)". * If your locale has a language-specific "START HERE"document, you will want to do a straight translation, and alter the Item_Help_StartHere_Uri accordingly.

data.name: Item_Help_StartHere_Uri
data.comment: file:///{APPDIR}/START HERE.html

data.name: Item_Help_SupportForum_Label
data.comment: "Support forum" NOTES: * This link will take the user to the English Support forums. So, you may want to translate the phrase as "Support forum (English)". Alternatively, if your locale has a language-specific Support forum, you will want to do a straight translation, and alter the Item_Help_SupportForum_Uri accordingly.

data.name: Item_Help_SupportForum_Uri
data.comment: https://www.thebuddyforum.com/honorbuddy-forum/honorbuddy-support/

data.name: Item_Help_TheBuddyForums_Label
data.comment: "The Buddy Forums"

data.name: Item_Help_TheBuddyForums_Uri
data.comment: http://thebuddyforum.com/ NOTES: * The Buddy Forum proper is not locale-specific, so there is no point in altering this URI.

data.name: Item_Help_Updates_Label
data.comment: "Updates" NOTES: * The Updates website is available in English only. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "Updates (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_Updates_Uri
data.comment: http://updates.buddyauth.com/ NOTES: * The Updates portal is only available in English, so there is no point in altering this URI.

data.name: Item_Help_Wiki_Label
data.comment: "Wiki" NOTES: * The Wiki is available in English only. If you feel appropriate, you may want to translate this as "Wiki (English)"

data.name: Item_Help_Wiki_Uri
data.comment: http://wiki.thebuddyforum.com/index.php?title=Category:Honorbuddy NOTES: * The Wiki is only available in English, so there is no point in altering this URI.

data.name: Item_IgnoreCheckpoints_Label
data.comment: "Pursue all quests"

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_HowItWorks_IgnoreCheckpoints
data.value: When enabled, {1} will not try to skip ahead to a level-appropriate part of the profile when the bot is started. This feature is useful for 'completionists', such as those seeking the Loremaster achievement. Enabling this feature means you may have to occasionally help {1} if you are considerably over-geared or over-level.
data.comment: "When profile checkpoints are ignored, {1} will not try to skip ahead to a level-appropriate part of the profile when started. This feature is useful for 'completionists', such as those seeking the Loremaster achievement." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the 'newline' character (unneeded for now) * {1} will be supplied as the Bot name (e.g., QuestBot) * Should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_KeybindDisclaimer_ToolTipFormat
data.value: This keybind will only work when the game client window has focus.{0}Not all keybind combinations will work on a given machine.
data.comment: "This keybind will only work when the game client window has focus.{0}Not all keybind combinations will work on a given machine." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the 'newline' character * Please use the newline character to break the translation at logical places where its not all one long text line. * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_KeybindKey_Label
data.comment: "Key:" A label used to identify the key used for a keybind. NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_KeybindModifiers_Label
data.comment: "Modifiers:" A section heading describing the modifier used for a keybind of Alt, Control, and Shift. NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_KeybindPauseResume_Label
data.comment: "Keybind Pause/Resume:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_KeybindPauseResume_ToolTip
data.value: Defines the hotkey for pausing or resuming the bot.
data.comment: "Defines the hotkey for pausing or resuming the bot." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_KeybindStartStop_Label
data.comment: "Keybind Start/Stop:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_KeybindStartStop_ToolTip
data.value: Defines the hotkey for starting or stopping the bot.
data.comment: "Defines the hotkey for starting or stopping the bot." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_LoadProfileFromBuddyStoreExcuse_Label
data.value: Please use main Honorbuddy window for this
data.comment: "Please use main Honorbuddy window for this"

data.name: Item_LoadProfileFromBuddyStore_Label
data.comment: "From Buddy Store..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: Item_LoadProfileFromFile_Label
data.comment: "From File..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: Item_LoadProfileFromWebSource_Label
data.comment: "From Web Source..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: Item_LoadProfile_Label
data.comment: "Load Profile"

data.name: Item_LockControlPositions_Label
data.comment: "Lock Control Positions" (prevents screen controls from being moved around or resized)

data.name: Item_LockControlPositions_ToolTip
data.value: When enabled, prevents dragging and resizing of the Buddy Control Panel components.
data.comment: "When enabled, prevents dragging and resizing of the Buddy Control Panel components." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_Plugins_Label
data.comment: "Plugins"

data.name: Item_Plugins_ToolTipFormat
data.value: Access to enabling and configuring {0} plugins.
data.comment: "Access to enabling and configuring {0} plugins." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the BuddyBot name (e.g., Honorbuddy) * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_ProfileConfiguration_Label
data.comment: "Profile Configuration..." NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ellipses ('...') if possible. This is a standard cue to the user that the item will pop up a dialog.

data.name: Item_ProfileConfiguration_ToolTip
data.value: Allows the user to override certain profile settings.
data.comment: "Allows the user to override certain profile settings." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_ProfileLocation_LabelFormat
data.comment: "Profile:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_ProfileLocation_ToolTipFormat
data.comment: "Profile location: {0}." NOTE: * {0} will be supplied as the profile location * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_RecentProfile_ToolTipFormat
data.comment: "Loads profile: '{0}'." (as in "Loads Profile: PROFILENAME") NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the profile location * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible. * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_StatusDisplayFontSize_Label
data.comment: "Status Display Font Size:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_StatusDisplayFontSize_ToolTip
data.value: Alters the font size used in the Status Display panel.
data.comment: "Alters the font size used in the Status Display panel" NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_Status_Label
data.comment: "Status:" NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_Uri_Label
data.comment: "URI:" (Uniform Resource Identifier; also known as the older "URL", Uniform Resource Locator). NOTES: * For translations, please maintain the trailing ':' if possible.

data.name: Item_VendorAction_MailSellRepair_Label
data.comment: "Mail, Repair, & Sell"

data.name: Item_VendorAction_MailSellRepair_ToolTip
data.value: Schedules mailing, repairing, and selling activities.
data.comment: "Schedules mailing, repairing, and selling activities." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_VendorAction_Mail_Label
data.comment: "Mail"

data.name: Item_VendorAction_Mail_ToolTip
data.value: Schedules a visit to the nearest Mailbox.
data.comment: "Schedules a visit to the nearest Mailbox." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: Item_VendorAction_Repair_Label
data.comment: "Repair"

data.name: Item_VendorAction_Repair_ToolTip
data.value: Schedules a visit to the nearest Repair vendor.
data.comment: "Schedules a visit to the nearest Repair vendor." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.comment: "Sell"

data.name: Item_VendorAction_Sell_ToolTip
data.value: Schedules a visit to Sell items at nearest Vendor.
data.comment: "Schedules a visit to Sell items at nearest Vendor." NOTES: * ToolTips should be properly capitalized and punctuated (e.g., end in a 'period'). This is required because ToolTips for certain controls are frequently composed of many smaller ToolTips.

data.name: GeneralText_DisabledNotAQuestBotProfile
data.comment: "Disabled—not a QuestBot profile."

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_HowItWorks_ProfileSettings
data.value: Profile setting overrides are maintained on a per-toon basis.{0}If 'Override Profile Settings' is enabled, the changes affect all profiles.
data.comment: "Profile setting overrides are maintained on a per-toon basis.{0}If 'Override Profile Settings' is enabled, the changes affect all profiles." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as a 'newline' character.

data.name: GeneralText_BotActionUnusable_VendorsInaccessible
data.value: Toon is not in an area where vendors are accessible.
data.comment: "Toon is not in an area where vendors are accessible."

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_InnkeeperNotPresent
data.comment: "Innkeeper \"{0}\" is not present—finding another." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the Innkeeper name.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_MovingToPlace
data.comment: "Moving to {0} (dist: {1}) @ {2}" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the place or NPC name. * {1} will be provided a numerical distance. * {2} will be provided as the location's coordinates.

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_UnableToLocateInnkeeperOnMap
data.value: Unable to locate an Innkeeper on Map {0}({1}) to pursue.
data.comment: "Unable to locate an Innkeeper on Map {0}({1}) to pursue." NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the map name. * {1} will be provided as the map ID.

data.name: BotAction_MoveToInnkeepAndExitGame_Label
data.value: Move to nearest Innkeep & Exit game
data.comment: "Move to nearest Innkeep & Exit game"

data.name: BotAction_MoveToInnkeepAndStopBot_Label
data.value: Move to nearest Innkeep & Stop bot
data.comment: "Move to nearest Innkeep & Stop bot"

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ArrivedAtLocation_BotStopped
data.comment: "Arrived at {0}... Bot stopped." NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the location or NPC name

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ArrivedAtLocation_GameExiting
data.value: Arrived at {1}... Exiting game.{0}(To cancel, turn off 'Innkeeper' Bot Action)
data.comment: "Arrived at {1}... Exiting game.{0}(To cancel, turn off 'Innkeeper' Bot Action)" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as a 'newline' character * {1} will be provided as the location or NPC name

data.name: GeneralText_UserCanceledInnkeeperGameExit
data.value: User canceled Innkeeper pursuit... Game Exit aborted.
data.comment: "User canceled Innkeeper pursuit... Game Exit aborted."

data.name: GeneralText_LocatingInnkeeper
data.comment: "Locating an Innkeeper..."

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ArrivedAtLocation_LoggingOut
data.value: Arrived at {1}... Logging out.{0}(To cancel, turn off 'Innkeeper' Bot Action)
data.comment: "Arrived at {1}... Logging out.{0}(To cancel, turn off 'Innkeeper' Bot Action)" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as a 'newline' character * {1} will be provided as the location or NPC name

data.name: GeneralText_UserCanceledInnkeeperLogout
data.value: User canceled Innkeeper pursuit... Logout aborted.
data.comment: "User canceled Innkeeper pursuit... Logout aborted."

data.name: BotAction_MoveToInnkeepAndLogout_Label
data.comment: "Move to nearest Innkeep & Logout"

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_InnkeeperNotNavigable
data.value: Unable to find path to Innkeeper "{0}"—finding another
data.comment: "Unable to find path to Innkeeper \"{0}\"—finding another." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the Innkeeper name.

data.name: Button_OverrideProfileSettings_Label
data.comment: "Override Profile Settings"

data.name: Button_OverrideProfileSettings_ToolTip
data.value: If enabled, these configuration settings will override those defined in the profile.
data.comment: If enabled, these configuration settings will override those defined in the profile."

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_ItemDisposition_ToolTip
data.comment: "Controls the disposition of {0} items." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the item quality color (e.g., "Blue")

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_MailItem_Label
data.comment: "Mail {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the item name or color (e.g., "Mail Purple")

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_MailItem_ToolTip
data.value: If checked, {1} items will be mailed if:{0}* The {1} item is 'unbound', and{0}* A Mail Recipient has been configured.
data.comment: "If checked, {1} items will be mailed if:{0}* The {1} item is 'unbound', and{0}* A Mail Recipient has been configured." NOTES: * {0} will be supplied a a newline character * {1} will be supplied as the item quality color (e.g., "Blue")

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_SellItem_Label
data.comment: "Sell {0}" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as the item name or color (e.g., "Mail Purple")

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_SellItem_ToolTip
data.value: If checked, {1} items will be sold to a vendor if:{0}* The item is not on the 'protected items' list, and{0}* The item is soulbound, or{0}* {1} item mailing is disabled
data.comment: "If checked, {1} items will be sold to a vendor if:{0}* The item is not on the 'protected items' list, and{0}* The item is soulbound, or{0}* {1} item mailing is disabled" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied a a newline character * {1} will be supplied as the item quality color (e.g., "Blue")

data.name: GeneralTextFormat_DefaultProfileSettingInUse
data.value: Default profile settings are in use.{0}Current profile setting is reflected here
data.comment: "Default profile settings are in use.{0}Current profile setting is reflected here" NOTES: * {0} will be supplied as a newline character.

data.name: Item_Exit_BuddyBotClose_ConfirmationQuestion
data.comment: "Do you wish to EXIT {0}?" NOTES: * {0} will be provided as the Buddy Bot name (e.g., Honorbuddy)

data.value: Do you wish to LOG OUT of the Game client, and exit {0}?
